attributes.action: set up an independent sovereign fund to either give low interest loans or invest money in VIABLE UK businesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many countries  such as Dubai have sovereign funds to invest in companies. The UK could have a similar fund limited to UK based viable companies. It would be independent to ensure investments are based on viablibility instead of political concerns such as constituency. It could give low interest loans which may encourage banks to start business lending and invest in viable new UK research. This fund would to be limited to UK companies as it is better to encourage growth in your own industries.
